title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Collaboration and partnership arent always as easy and sweet as you wish. Sometimes, a little edge in how you speak with a partner adds juice to a mixture brimming with potential. However, sharp criticism and acerbic sarcasm may feel more like pouring gasoline on a fire than adding hot sauce to your food for spice. Thankfully, you can moderate the extremes by nudging and encouraging people instead of confronting them with their faults. Discover new ways to be your best self with each other, and neither of you will settle for mediocre results. Harmony promotes growth. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
